applicant_types: charities; community organisations; CICs; not-for-profit organisations
geographic_scope: West Midlands, Warwickshire, Coventry, Solihull, Birmingham, Black Country, Tipton, Edgbaston, Northfield
beneficiary_focus: disadvantaged people; socially excluded groups; young people; older adults; people with long term disabilities; local communities
restrictions: Funding only available for projects in specified areas (West Midlands, Warwickshire, Coventry, Solihull, Birmingham, Black Country, Tipton, Edgbaston, Northfield); Individual applications not accepted; Some funds are currently closed due to oversubscription
deadline: Fund closed to applicants on October 9th (for at least one fund); other funds' status not specified but appear closed or area-restricted
notes: All available funds are restricted to organisations operating within the West Midlands and surrounding areas. ellenor Hospice is based in Kent and outside the eligible geographic area for all listed funds.
evidence: The Heart of England Community Foundation only funds projects and organisations operating within the West Midlands, Warwickshire, Coventry, Solihull, Birmingham, Black Country, Tipton, Edgbaston, and Northfield. ellenor Hospice is based in Kent, which is not within the eligible geographic scope. All available grants explicitly list geographic restrictions that exclude Kent. No funds are open to applicants outside these areas. Therefore, ellenor Hospice is not eligible to apply.
